text: Ani tya lokanni allahakherija jyanna apale aradhya daivata banavuna thevale ahe, te konatihi vastu nirmana karu sakata nahi, kimbahuna te svatah(ekhadyakaduna) nirmana kele jatata te svatah apalya labha-hanica adhikara balagata nahita ani na jivana-mrtyuca ani na dusaryanda jivanta ho'una uthanyace te malaka aheta
